name: An Alien Adventure
description:
The theme for the game was limited space.

A short adventure game about a martial who is stranded on an unfamiliar planet.

Note: Collect oxygen cannisters to synthesize them back at your ship. You must return to your ship to recharge your O2 meter. The goal is to find the fuel cannister hidden somewhere around the map and bring it back to your ship.

Controls: Press E to synthesize oxygen, and WASD to move.
